room.name: The forest center
room.short_description: The center of the forest has trees for miles
room.long_description:
The center of the forest has thousands of trees
Through one of the trees, you see a terrifying monster

room.name: Your car
room.short_description: It appears to have the windows smashed
room.long_description:
It appears to have the windows smashed
Upon closer inspection, you spot blood stains on the window

room.name: A bush
room.short_description: Something appears to have disturbed it recently
room.long_description:
The bush appears to have all of its berries picked
Something has definitely been here recently

room.name: A bear trap
room.short_description: It has managed to cut off half of your leg
room.long_description: The bear trap is so sharp that it cleanly cut off your leg

room.name: A hunter's cottage
room.short_description: On the table, you manage to find an ancient axe
room.long_description:
Someone has clearly entered this cottage recently
Upon closer inspection, it looks like something has exited through a window

room.name: The deep forest
room.short_description: This place is surrounded by rocks
room.long_description:
This place is surrounded by jagged rocks
It looks like there is a small crack in one of them

room.name: The monster's lair
room.short_description: A monster lives here, which you manage to kill
room.long_description:
Upstairs, you hear a monster snoring
You kill the monster in its sleep

room.name: The cottage attic
room.long_description: It must have been ages since somebody last cleaned this attic

room.name: The cottage basement
room.long_description:
There is rubble everywhere!
You should leave seen while you still remember how to get out.

item.name: Stumped Leg
item.desc: The remains of your leg from a bear trap

item.name: Axe
item.desc: An axe which you found in a cottage

item.name: Car Keys
item.desc: Generally useful for driving a car
